title: Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain, plate 78 from Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravés d après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain
marks:
Inscription

In plate in black: [78/ Paul Verone
description: Annunciation; Virgin seated at left, Archangel Gabriel at right with lily in right hand and left hand pointing upward; God with cherubs and dove above
